brief_title: An Investigational Drug Study in the Treatment of Primary Dysmenorrhea (0663-064)
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the pain relieving effect and safety of an investigational drug in women with moderate to severe primary dysmenorrhea (painful menstruation).
description: Two etoricoxib 60 mg placebo tablets and one naproxen sodium 550 mg tablet, single-dose, following onset of moderate-to-severe pain due to primary dysmenorrhea
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Women 18 years of age or older suffering from painful menstruation Exclusion Criteria: - Women taking medications that are not allowed in the study (such as pain medications, antidepressants, tranquilizers, hypnotics, sedatives, or oral contraceptives). - Women who are pregnant, breast-feeding or within 6 weeks of giving birth
